Tiffany <tnamwong@...> wrote:
 
>>I will probably duplicate this thread on Shinsengumimb.com
so tired...just finished fanart...fingers covered with blue marker and I posted a long message explaining why SAitou didn't anticipate Shishio's metal headband.<<
 
Like I said, if you'll give me a couple of days I'll get the screenshots up on my site and post the direct URL in response to MissB's original post about the guy.  No need to start a new thread.
 
>>I know that sarcastic smirk anywhere.<<

And those eyes!!!  Even the way his arms are folded in the outdoor shot.
>>It's Saitou with a wig...which kind of worries me and adds the
possibility of Saitou with Kamatari tendencies. 0_0 <<
 
Can't help thinking of Yamazaki in PMK... :-D  Personally, I just can't see RK Saitou being believable as a woman.  He's gorgeous as a man, but he'd make one big, ugly woman (heh... like the Big Bad Wolf trying to pass as a granny?).  Still, there is that academy award winning act he pulled off with Itou's group.

phil (who's just gone through the fight between Saitou & Sano outside Katsu's house frame by frame and is amazed yet again at how many faces Saitou shows!)
